content.label: As with all of the Room chapters, this is superb!!! You do not pay for a game but an experience. I can’t say enough positive things! I never write these reviews! Please keep taking my money!! Love love love!
Thoroughly enjoyed all of the room games.
Difficulty level was perfect to keep me challenged, and it’s very satisfying when you solve a puzzle area. Definitely my favorite puzzle game yet, thank you for the experience! :)

title.label: A Masterpiece of a Puzzle Game

content.label:
I thoroughly enjoyed every puzzle, interaction, and cutscene. The whole game was insanely well thought out. The final cutscene after completing the game was the cherry on top. 
Excellent job Fireproof Games!
Trust me!

title.label: Abigail You Genius! You Knew to Marry Edward.?!

content.label: Very puzzling this one is. Could anyone believe the Null and that Mr. Edward?  I think in time we all discovered who knew too much. This is definitely one for the ages and one, one should not overestimate?

title.label: The best of the room games

content.label: Absolutely love this, getting close to finished, really nails the atmosphere.  Love the doll house idea, keeps it large while feeling contained, beautiful work!

title.label: What a great game and a great series of games

content.label: Seriously this game and other Room games of the series are awesome games and totally worth the time involved.
Enthralling!
I love this series. I hope there will be more.

title.label: I love this series of games!

content.label: I have enjoyed the entire series of The Room. All four games are fascinating, challenging and a lot of fun. Frustrating at times, but the gentle hints included help. When will there be a number 5 in the series? Or another games? I am addicted.

I’ve played all but the Pocket game, and I replayed the prior games before starting this one. The puzzles are often challenging but not ridiculous. I’ve enjoyed the story, even though it is told in chunks and pieces. It honestly leaves me wanting more. I don’t trust The Circle!

The biggest challenges with gameplay are often just making sure you’re oriented properly within the game view, but that isn’t too difficult to overcome. This is a great puzzle game, and I recommend the whole series. They have improved with each iteration. I can’t wait for the next one!

Truly amazing puzzle game, compelling story, and beautiful graphics.  I have played them all, and they are tremendous fun.  Even after beating them, it’s fun to go back and play them again, since it’s impossible to remember how it all worked the previous time.  If you like puzzles, this is for you!

Like the rest of the games in this series, it’s absolutely gorgeous. The clever mechanical puzzles thrill the latent engineer in me. I did have to ask for hints a few times; mostly because I missed something but once or twice because the gameplay was unclear (the dragons!). But all in all the frustrations were minor and I thoroughly enjoyed it.
This game is a solid 10/10 the attention to detail is immaculate and the puzzles are so intricate

I love your games. This is the 3rd I’ve played and I’ve played them all more than once. When comparing them I must say that this one had the most engaging story and I loved the final scene. I made me what to heck out you latest game. But I am fining the back and for one room to another that you can only reach from circling and certain angels and then the special glass keeps coming of... it’s a little tedious. It distracts from the game flow and slows things down unnecessarily. Other than loved it! keep up the interesting story line, it really hooks you in.

Awesome game play 
Storyline amazing 
Please bring more of these games

By the time I got to this game I had learned to navigate without looking at any walk throughs, and I found it very delightful to the last frame.  I was sad to finish, knowing that it will be a while until the next offering ..... can't wait!
I played every one of them they’re all wonderful
These are the only games that have grabbed me and I couldn't stop. Outstanding graphics and puzzles, really makes you think. Can't wait for the next one  A+++++++++

Ok. First off, this IS a five-star game. 

I’m writing this to get the developer’s attention. 

I ran into a major glitch in the kitchen. On the left side of the stove there are two yellow half-wheels and a number of blue bars that can only be seen with the eyepiece. 

We have turn the wheels a number of times, in different configurations so we can slide the blue bars through the slots in the yellow wheels, which will turn the screw above it and unlock the center door of the oven. 

The glitch occurred when one of the blue bars got “locked into” a solid section of the top half-wheel. They were occupying the same physical space. I could do nothing to move either of them. I had to restart the game. 

Check it out. I don’t recall what I did to make that happen, but the glitch is there.
Fabulous graphics, very intricate puzzles, but hints really help a novice like me.  BEST OF ALL:  no in app purchases!

I wanted to enjoy Riven except it was way too hard. This game had difficult puzzles but they were solvable. I was never frustrated because I was able to think it through and when the puzzle was finally solved, I felt a sense of accomplishment rather than feeling as thought I had to “cheat” my way through it. The graphics and moving parts were magnificent too. Although this game was developed by geniuses, you do not have to be one to finish it. Enjoy-this type of game does NOT come along every day!
Another gem in the library of Room puzzle and mystery games.  I have been playing for many years and they never disappoint.
Having just finished The Room Three - with some help, I bought this one.   Looks like another great puzzler, but this time I will be looking for those secret latches, locks, etc.
I wish there was more to it but all in all I loved it.

First off, this is an amazing game. I’ve played it more than once and always had fun. This time around I couldn’t restore my purchase and had to purchase it again (not bad —99¢), and then certain parts of the game would just turn to black; especially when I had to use the lens to see the invisible markings. Also, wouldn’t let me play the epilogue level, even though I force closed the app multiple times. May work better on an iPad (played on an iPhone)? Otherwise, very solid storyline and fun puzzles.

I loved every one of these games! The graphics and sounds are absolutely awesome. The puzzles are challenging, making you think outside the box to solve wonderful puzzles within puzzles. I loved the end of this one! Can’t wait to experience the next chapter!

These games are amazing. I take it back they are out of this world!
When I started to play The Room it was like I had discovered a new universe that I could not stop. These games are absolutely out of this world. I hope you keep doing this kind of work.  The detail, the genius in every room to get to the next and the next and the next is superb. 
I love you guys!!   Thank you, Thank you!!

In an age where games are designed for in app purchases and no one endeavors to make a truly compelling game, this one stands out. Fun, challenging, and very affordable. Can’t recommend this game enough.
I loved going through the rooms, finding unexpected connections. This is my third game of The Room series and I highly recommend them.

Again Fireproof has outdone themselves and set a new high bar for escape/puzzle games.  I was sucked into the story/game almost immediately.  My one and only gripe is I wish it was longer.  Like the other Room games I’m always sad when I have completed them, wanting more and for the story to continue.
Can’t go to escape rooms right now and I’m really glad you get get this challenge on my iPad!
I binged the entire series over the last week and each game was better than the last. Can’t wait to dive into the vr game soon.

I really enjoyed playing this game. I want to find the other ones before this one. I recommend this game. Enjoy and have fun. 
LD
Bibliomom said it all!

The game has beautiful and interactive graphics, with great puzzles and just enough hints to keep me from throwing in the towel.  I really enjoyed the moody scenes, sounds, and storyline.  Well done, Fireproof, I’ll be buying the next one too.

title.label: Amazing game with twists and turns

content.label: Have to say I was expecting an amazing game and got one without a doubt. Hoping the play the next one soon.
Could not put it down. Well worth it!
Excellent audio and visual stimulation.
First time playing this game. Bought the whole franchise.  Just superb top to bottom.

Played all of the Fireproof Games, and this one for me was the best of the bunch - a great deal of fun to play. There are some tougher screens, and my suggestion is to put the game down walk away and return later. The clues are intertwined, and well organized. Wish there was another game to play! Nothing else seems to measure up to this series.

title.label: My favorite of the series yet.

content.label: The puzzles in the game are second to none in terms of gameplay and just how beautiful the game is. I really enjoyed how each puzzle was tied to several other puzzles in order to solve it. The name might be misleading this is actually the fourth game in the series and I’d highly recommend playing them first before this one. I normally don’t buy apps but I’ve bought all 4 now. The developer(s) are brilliant and hopefully if we support their games they will continue to make more.
I love the game mechanics and everything about the puzzle systems, but it feels like I’m conducting a ritual in the playing of the game.
This app was worth to price. It was fun to play. I would recommend it to anyone.

title.label: The best mobile game ever made!!!

content.label: This game is epic and mind blowing! I’ve been searching for something to play that doesn’t feel like a mobile game and I was pleasantly surprised when I started playing. This game is worth more that $5, you can tell they spent thousands of hours developing it. The detail is nothing like any game you’ve ever played. I highly recommend!!!!!
I absolutely love these games. They’re the best. So intriguing and compelling. I can’t wait for more!

Finally a game that doesn’t hit you with advertisements left and right. This game had really nice visuals and enjoyable puzzles. Nothing too difficult to solve and the hints are nice if you do get stuck on something.  I wish more games used this approach.
I have always loved “The Room” puzzle game series. I enjoyed this one very much. The story was very captivating. But to be honest, I preferred the 1st and 2nd game. However, this is very fun

title.label: Thrilled to Find Fireproof Made Another

content.label: I remember my hesitation to purchase the original “The Room”. After playing it, I knew that Fireproof had a winning puzzle game. I have purchased every sequel since and I am always glad I did. For the entertainment value, for this genre, it is simply the best. The Room: Old Sins, delivers as expected. I can’t wait for the next installment.
